attributes.action: Keep Landrover Design, in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of the most reliable brands in the world is being sold for economic purposes, to India. Apart from the Railways, this is one of the most famous British Brands, and is still No.1, and an export we really can't afford to loose.
Still the first choice of the British Army.
We are as much as selling the country down the river, by doing this.
Time for the government to step in and protect.
